title: Run a Post-Game Fan Survey
description: A team wants to gather feedback on the game day experience by sending a survey to all attending fans.

tasks.description: Create a survey with questions about topics like parking, concessions, and entertainment.
Generate a list of all fans who attended yesterday's game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of all attendees.

tasks.description: Send the survey link to all attendees via email.
Analyze the survey results and create a report summarizing the feedback.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report showing that fans were unhappy with the new security screening process.
